title: champs that Im really hoping to see get a skin in 5.13

replies.body:
{{champion:112}} has Creator Viktor. Nothing else is needed.
{{champion:7}} has Ravenborn LeBlanc (Harrowing skin). Nothing else is needed. (Get it during Harrowing if you don't have it.
{{champion:11}} is getting a Chroma pack for Headhunter Yi; it's on the PBE right now, check it out on Surrenderat20.net. Nothing else is needed.

{{champion:83}} needs Pool Boy/Pool Cleaner Yorick (pool skimmer instead of shovel). After that, nothing else is needed. 
{{champion:131}} could probably use another skin.
{{champion:268}} needs the Necromancer skin concept that I've seen in this board. 
{{champion:60}} needs a funny-themed skin. All hers are serious.
{{champion:150}} will need a new one soon. 
{{champion:143}}'s best skin is SKT Zyra, which is a little bit sad. She needs one that's actually good.
{{champion:254}} needs a Chroma pack for Neon Strike Vi. I will buy it in a heartbeat. 
{{champion:62}} could use a silly-themed skin as well.
{{champion:50}} probably needs one. But he needs some updating first.
And I REALLLLLY want {{champion:78}} to get a new skin when she gets updated; I know she most likely won't, but still, I can dream. And I will buy it. 

That's all I have to say about that.

STEEL LEGION SHYVANA!!!! It is seriously an amazing idea and it would fit with all the steel legions being Demacian. 
Imagine a suited up girl that wecks and literally transforms into a giant mechanic dragon.

hextec would also make sense but steel legion suits her way more
And its the only skin i want more than anything in the world
